## Project Summary

- Architecture: Next.js App Router + React Components
- Language: TypeScript + Next.js
- Type: application
- Files: 15 | Functions: 24 | Classes: 0
- Stack: runtime: Node.js, framework: Next.js 14+, language: TypeScript, ui: React, styling: Tailwind CSS
